snippet: Tanaka pitched two innings in his spring training debut for the Yankees, who also saw some promising signs from Rob Refsnyder, auditioning for a reserve infielder role.
abstract: New York Yankees pitcher Masahiro Tanaka pitches two innings in game against Philadelphia Phillies, first time he has played since wild-card playoff game against Houston Astros; performance suggests Tanaka is on pace to start on opening day.
lead_paragraph: Tanaka pitched two innings in his spring training debut for the Yankees, who also saw some promising signs from Rob Refsnyder, auditioning for a reserve infielder role.

headline.main: Masahiro Tanaka Returns to Mound for Yankees After Off-Season Surgery
headline.print_headline: Tanaka Returns to Mound for Yankees After Off-Season Surgery for Bone Spur
